title: Sitka National Historical Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets         Service animals are allowed inside the federal buildings. NPS Photo  Sitka National Historical Park is a great place to walk your dog on leash! Pets are allowed on the park trails and grounds of the park, but must be leashed at all times. Service animals are allowed in all federal buildings.   Service Animals ADA Revised Regulations
